attr.title: FAITH: Demon Siege
attr.desc: Battle off an onslaught of angry demons by using your firepower, holy water, and helpful upgrades in this thrillingly retro top-down shooter.
attr.inst: -Download from CrackedGhostGames https://crackedghostgames.itch.io/faith-demon-siege -Locate data.win and place inside gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
-Download from [CrackedGhostGames](https://crackedghostgames.itch.io/faith-demon-siege) 
-Locate data.win and place inside gamedata folder.
